typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	date as string ('1899-01-01'),
	row_num as integer (0)
}
source(output(
		EQP_SCHED_ID as integer,
		AC_RGSTRN as string,
		STS_CD as string,
		STS_NAME as string,
		STS_DESC as string,
		STRT_TIME as timestamp,
		END_TIME as timestamp,
		NOTE as string,
		IS_DELD as boolean,
		UPDTD_AT as timestamp,
		ADF_TIME_STMP as timestamp,
		ADF_RUN_ID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: ("SELECT * FROM [dbo].[S_EQUIP_SCHD] where  UPDTD_AT > '"+$date+"'"),
	format: 'query') ~> StgEquipSchd
StgEquipSchd aggregate(groupBy(AC_RGSTRN,
		STS_CD,
		STRT_TIME),
	each(match(name!='AC_RGSTRN'&&name!='STS_CD'&&name!='STRT_TIME'), $$ = iif(first(UPDTD_AT)>last(UPDTD_AT),first($$),last($$)))) ~> DistinctRows
DistinctRows derive(row_num = $row_num +1) ~> AddRowCount
AddRowCount window(over(row_num),
	asc(row_num, true),
	EQUIP_ID = row_num + rowNumber()) ~> SetEquipID
SetEquipID sink(skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
